Posts.Content: Dec 4, 2009 04:46PM jane1254 wrote: KarenPB1951 Thank you for sharing.  I am new to the site, but scheduled for surgery on Monday 12/7.  I am afraid of that hit in the chest feeling when I wake up.  I am having a Rt. Mast.  Hopefully, I will feel it on one side not both.You sound so good.  You are inspiring me.  I have been so afraid, I considered cancelling this morning. How did it feel when you were given the anesthesia?  I am afraid of that as well. Thank you again for sharing.
Posts.Title: having bilateral mx December 4th klml4 Issymom
